author: andreas
content: Thanks. No special technique. This lens is just so good. When I have time and can re-try, I can even hold 1/4s at 50mm. I've just tried and the second attempt was successful. If there's anything at all, then it's that I try to press the release as soft as possible, but that's it. From what I saw so far, I suppose Tamron's VC is better than Nikon's VR, or if not better, then it's at least as good.
